title: 109_hr5111
content: Royalty In-Kind for Energy Assistance Improvement Act of 2006 - Amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005, with respect to federal low-income energy assistance programs, to authorize the Secretary of Energy to sell at a discounted price any royalty oil or gas taken in-kind. Requires the discounted price to be at least 50 of the fair market value of the oil or gas.
